faq.question: What is MultiversX?
faq.answer: MultiversX is a high-performance, sharded smart contract blockchain with Proof of Stake (SPoS) consensus, designed for the Web3 era with the capacity to serve Web2 needs.

faq.question: How many transactions per second (TPS) can MultiversX achieve?
faq.answer: At the moment of writing, MultiversX achieves over 30,000 TPS with adaptive scalability, offering fast and low-cost transactions.

faq.question: What is EGLD?
faq.answer: EGLD is the native cryptocurrency of MultiversX, functioning as digital, global money and serving as the primary asset within the MultiversX ecosystem.

faq.question: What are the key features of EGLD?
faq.answer: EGLD has several key features: Ownership (full control over your funds), Security (protected by cryptography under your own account), Decentralization (no central authority controls it), and Accessibility (usable with just an internet connection and a wallet).

faq.question: MultiversX docs link?
faq.answer: You can find the official documentation at https://docs.multiversx.com/learn/getting-started.
